ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This study was supported by the funding of the 1.3.5 project for disciplines of excellence, West China Hospital, Sichuan University (ZYJC18038), the National Clinical Research Center for Geriatrics, West China Hospital, Sichuan University (Grant No. Z20192006 and Z2018B08), the Science Foundation of Chengdu Science and Technology Bureau (2019-YF05-00307-SN), and the Sichuan Science and Technology Program (Grant No. 2021YJ0415).
